cases.title: Enforced Disappearances in Turbat
cases.summary: Multiple cases of enforced disappearances reported in Turbat district. At least 12 individuals reported missing after being detained by security forces.

cases.title: Extrajudicial Killings in Gwadar
cases.summary: Three civilians killed in police operation in Gwadar. Eyewitnesses report lack of proper investigation.

cases.title: Crackdown on Protesters in Karachi
cases.summary: Security forces detained 45 protesters during peaceful demonstration against electricity shortages. Multiple injuries reported.

cases.title: Police Brutality in Hyderabad
cases.summary: Two civilians killed during police operation. Local human rights groups report excessive use of force.

cases.title: Arbitrary Detentions in Peshawar
cases.summary: Over 50 individuals detained without charge during security operation. Human rights groups raise concerns about due process violations.

cases.title: Torture in Police Custody
cases.summary: Multiple reports of torture in police custody. Human rights organizations document severe physical abuse.

cases.title: Freedom of Expression Restrictions
cases.summary: Multiple journalists and activists detained for social media posts. Reports of internet shutdowns during protests.

cases.title: Forced Displacement in Skardu
cases.summary: Hundreds of families forcibly displaced due to military operations. Reports of property destruction.

cases.title: Extrajudicial Killings in Lahore
cases.summary: Four civilians killed in police encounter. Human rights groups question the circumstances of the killings.

cases.title: Freedom of Religion Restrictions
cases.summary: Multiple religious minorities detained under blasphemy laws. Reports of harassment and intimidation.

cases.title: Deadly Crackdown on PTI Protesters
cases.summary: Multiple deaths and mass detentions during protests by Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) in Islamabad. Security forces reportedly used lethal and less-lethal force, enforced a communication blackout, and arrested over 600 protesters. At least six deaths, including four security officers, were reported.
cases.category: Freedom of Assembly / Unlawful Use of Force
